entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 3:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -22.9°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 34 km/h

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
